name: Generic Space Station Hub
description: You are in the central hub of a generic space station. It's clean, sterile, and smells faintly of ozone. Corridors stretch out in all directions.

name: North Corridor
description: A long, white corridor stretches north. A sign on the wall points west towards the Docking Bay.

name: Docking Bay Entrance
description: You are outside a large blast door leading to the docking bay.

name: East Corridor
description: A long, white corridor stretches east. You can hear faint music coming from a door to the south.

name: Station Cantina
description: A cozy, dimly lit cantina. A few patrons are scattered around. A technician is nursing a drink at the bar.

name: South Corridor
description: A long, white corridor stretches south. It ends in a maintenance access panel.

name: West Corridor
description: A long, white corridor stretches west. It seems to be a service corridor, with pipes and conduits lining the walls.
